snippet.title: The Creation - Magical Adventure Shooter Game!
snippet.description:
In search of an old ancient myth about the mysterious “Creator of Worlds”, you find yourself in a forest far far away. Unwrap the mysteries and secrets about this magical place and find your way back home!

Download link on Itch - https://jivapeira.itch.io/the-creation
Download link on GameJolt - https://gamejolt.com/games/TheCreation/648627

Voice Acting:
Goblins - https://www.youtube.com/c/CommonGoblinGaming
Magic Mushroom Fairy - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCd5ZTx-U0iCz58TYTbSdL_w

Additional Art and Concepts:
https://www.youtube.com/c/KiddKarizmaYT
https://krimmuxd.myportfolio.com/commissions

#indie #indiedev #pcgame #adventure #spooky
